windows-programs.name: Adobe Photoshop 2024
windows-programs.shortDesc: Professional image editing and graphic design software
windows-programs.fullDesc: Adobe Photoshop is the industry-standard software for digital image processing and editing, used by photographers and designers worldwide. Create stunning images, graphics, paintings and 3D artwork on your desktop or iPad.

android-apps.name: WhatsApp Messenger
android-apps.shortDesc: Simple, reliable and secure messaging app
android-apps.fullDesc: WhatsApp Messenger is a FREE messaging app available for Android and other smartphones. WhatsApp uses your phone's Internet connection to let you message and call friends and family.
features: Group chats with up to 256 people

android-games.name: PUBG Mobile
android-games.shortDesc: Official PUBG game designed for mobile
android-games.fullDesc: PUBG MOBILE is the original battle royale game on mobile! 100 players parachute onto a remote island to battle in a winner-takes-all showdown. Players have to locate and scavenge their own weapons, vehicles and supplies.

phone-tools.name: SP Flash Tool
phone-tools.shortDesc: Firmware flashing tool for MediaTek devices
phone-tools.fullDesc: SP Flash Tool is a Windows application for flashing firmware on MediaTek (MTK) based Android devices. It supports various operations including firmware upgrade, format, and backup.
phone-tools.note: Use with caution - can brick your device if used incorrectly

frp-apps.name: Samsung FRP Tool
frp-apps.shortDesc: FRP bypass tool for Samsung devices
frp-apps.fullDesc: Professional FRP bypass tool specifically designed for Samsung devices. Works with latest Samsung models and Android versions. Easy to use interface with step-by-step instructions.
frp-apps.note: For educational purposes only. Only use on devices you own.
